des.title: Awarded First Place in Hackathon
des.org: Cannon Secondary School and Digi School Lumbini province
des: Secured 1st place in a 2-hour province-level coding and animation hackathon organized by Digischool and Cannon Secondary School in Lumbini Province, competing solo in Category 3 (Classes 6â€“7).
Represented Nawajyoti English Boarding School as the only participant from the school and defeated opponents by over 300 points, showcasing exceptional problem-solving speed and accuracy.

Developed a Python-based scientific calculator featuring both basic operations and advanced vector and matrix calculations using NumPy, demonstrating strong programming skills and efficient algorithm design under time constraints.

des.title: HackerRank Frontend Developer (React) Certification
des: Certified as a React (Frontend) Developer by HackerRank after successfully completing the proctored skills assessment.

Demonstrated practical proficiency in building React applications, including JSX, components, props, state management, hooks, event handling, conditional rendering, and strong fundamentals in JavaScript and CSS.
Validated real-world frontend development skills and problem-solving ability, showcasing verified technical expertise to potential employers and peers.

des.title: 200 Days of LeetCode Challenge
des: Successfully completed 200 consecutive days of solving algorithm and data structure problems on LeetCode, demonstrating consistent practice and dedication.
Solved a wide range of problems across multiple categories including Arrays, Strings, Trees, Graphs, Dynamic Programming, and Backtracking.
Strengthened problem-solving skills, optimized coding efficiency, and improved understanding of algorithmic patterns for real-world software development.
